    #include<stdio.h>
    int main()
    {
    	int t,j=0;
    	scanf("%d",&t);
    	while(j++,t--)
    	{
    		int n,i,min=0,center=0,max=0;
    		scanf("%d",&n);
    		for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
    		{
    			int a;
    			scanf("%d",&a);
    			if(max<a)
    			{
    				min=center;
    				center=max;
    				max=a;
    			}
    			else if(center<a)
    			{
    				min=center;
    				center=a;
    			}
    			else if(min<a)
    				min=a;
    		}
    		printf("Case %d: %d\n",j,min+center+max);
    	}
    	return 0;
    }
